local_intent: Confirm handle visibility, move to the dishwasher, then approach and align to the dishwasher_handle (retry up to 2 times) and verify target remains visible.
assumptions: Handle is a valid visual target named 'dishwasher_handle'
coherence_with_global: Replicates the global pre-steps: visibility Fallback → MoveTo dishwasher → ApproachAndAlign with tolerance 0.005 and timeout 1200; adds minimal retry and post-check.
